mapper.select: select PP_SQ_PK from PRDT_POST_TB where PCI_SQ_PK = #{value}
select PCI_SQ_PK from PRDT_COMMON_INFO_TB where PCI_PRDT_NAME = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into PRDT_POST_TB values (PRDT_POST_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{PP_TITLE}, #{PRDT_ST_NM_PK}, #{PP_BODY}, #{DLVR_CHRG_NM_PK}, #{PP_SAVING_MILEAGE_PERCENT}, 'ueehyeon@gmail.com', sysdate, sysdate, #{PCI_SQ_PK})
